membershipConfirmationProgress2: Confirming your membership in the company by doing some magic in the background... Please, be patient...
membershipConfirmed: It seems like you have got an invitation to the company and you are the new one here, huh? Let's set up your account then!
memberPersonalData: In order to get access to your company, you need to set up your account first, personal data, password and recovery keys. Don't worry, it won't take much time, and let's start with personal data - first name and last name.
memberPersonalDataSetup: In order to continue, provide your first name and your last name.
memberPassword: To create and log in to your account, you need to create a password. Please, make sure that you create strong password you will remember.
clickToContinue: Click the button below in order to continue
memberConfirmErrorDesc1: Something went wrong while confirming your membership :(
memberConfirmErrorDesc2: It seems like the account has already been confirmed or confirmation hash has not been found.
memberConfirmErrorDesc3: If your account has already been confirmed, you can feel free to log in to it. Otherwise, check the confirmation link for typos or contact your administrator.
memberAccCreated: Now you can freely log in to your account and access your company and manage your personal and security account settings.
